help-file.title: ALIGNMENT
help-file.content:
Your character's alignment (GOOD, NEUTRAL or EVIL) will govern how he or she reacts to other players and/or monsters. The following is an outline of the alignment system:
GOOD (350 to 1000) is the most prone to change (i.e., the hardest to maintain). Killing other good-aligned players and monsters will harm it the most, but killing neutrals can shift it towards evil as well.
NEUTRAL (-349 to 349) is affected most by killing non-extreme alignments (i.e., other neutrals). Killing extremes such as 1000 and -1000 is just maintaining the balance, and will have no effect on your alignment.
EVIL (-350 to -1000) is the most difficult to change. Almost anything an evil person kills can be considered (at best) a neutral act, but it is most likely the kill will just serve to make the person more evil. Only by killing things more evil than oneself can one creep up out of the pit.
Alignment ranges from -1000 to 1000. Due to the way alignment works, before long your alignment will actually reflect your playing style, and will not fluctuate much unless you change your playing style drastically.
